description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d9j8h","text":"This documents outline the criteria for human liver tissue donor eligibility for the Hubmap BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP), Transformative Technology Development (TTD) Center at Columbia University/Pennsylvania State University. Samples include those from liver resections/biopsies/transplantation. Donor eligibility, consent for tissue donation, documentation on donor medical history and sample storage is performed by the Columbia University Biobank.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pu0g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2gl5","text":"-Age range \u003e18","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a86p5","text":"-BMI \u003c29","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcjeo","text":"-All race, ethnicity and gender (equal male and female) are accepted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f89","text":"-Negative for HIV, Hepatitis B or C virus, CMV or EBV, COVID-19, sepsis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jaom","text":"-Negative for liver diseases including fatty liver disease, hepatocellular carcinoma, and diabetes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36cof","text":"-Visual inspection of liver for any abnormalities","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sn8g","text":"-Site of tissue far from benign lesions for resection cases","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d5v8","text":"-If available, recover at least 1cm x 1cm x 1cm of liver and flash freeze as quickly as possible on dry ice /isopentane slurry (without OCT) and store at -80C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g9kd","text":"-Warm ischemia time \u003c30 minutes and/or cold ischemia time \u003c 2 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28fvh","text":"-Normal histology and tissue quality assessed by hematoxylin and eosin staining by expert pathologist","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"710c6","text":"The metadata related to the sample to include:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sgm6","text":"-Pathogenesis/diagnosis for resected tissue or donor cause of death","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d8hq","text":"-Donor age","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lh2h","text":"-Demographics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjtvt","text":"-Medications and dose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dmo5","text":"-Serological test results including HepB, HepC, HIV, CMV, EBV","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5misl","text":"-Past medical history","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62d0p","text":"-Smoking/Drug use/Alcohol use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k6v1","text":"-Time from brain death, if deceased liver donors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Donor eligibility Criteria for Human Liver for HuBMAP TTD-Columbia/PSU
